MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY16 and SY15 postcode areas of Montgomery and Newtown. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to a grounded overhead line  and we are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:25am on the 3rd December 2020.
